column1: in memory of mr. james henry burnette -- cc carter funeral home| mr. james henry burnette. april 14
column5: 2015. place of death: his residence. occupation: retired brickmason. biography. services pending. it is the desire of the burnette family that you keep them in your thoughts and prayers. the family of the late mr. james henry burnette has entrusted his care to the staff of c. c. carter funeral home llc.
